 215      // Within a gallery
 216      if(!empty($gallery))
 217      {
 218          $path = $gallery."/";
 219          $real_path = $mybb->settings['avatardir']."/".$path;
 220          if(is_dir($real_path))
 221          {
 222              // Build friendly gallery breadcrumb
 223              $gallery_path = explode("/", $gallery);
 224              foreach($gallery_path as $key => $url_bit)
 225              {
 226                  if($breadcrumb_url) $breadcrumb_url .= "/";
 227                  $breadcrumb_url .= $url_bit;
 228                  $gallery_name = str_replace(array("_", "%20"), " ", $url_bit);
 229                  $gallery_name = ucwords($gallery_name);
 230  
 231                  if($gallery_path[$key+1])
 232                  {
 233                      $breadcrumb .= " &raquo; <a href=\"index.php?module=user-users&amp;action=avatar_gallery&amp;uid={$user['uid']}&amp;gallery={$breadcrumb_url}\">{$gallery_name}</a>";
 234                  }
 235                  else
 236                  {
 237                      $breadcrumb .= " &raquo; {$gallery_name}";
 238                  }
 239              }
 240          }
 241          else
 242          {
 243              exit;
 244          }
 245      }
 246      else
 247      {
 248          $path = "";
 249          $real_path = $mybb->settings['avatardir'];
 250      }
 251  
 252      // Get a listing of avatars/directories within this gallery
 253      $sub_galleries = $avatars = array();
 254      $files = @scandir($real_path);
 255      
 256      if(is_array($files))
 257      {
 258          foreach($files as $file)
 259          {
 260              if($file == "." || $file == ".." || $file == ".svn")
 261              {
 262                  continue;
 263              }
 264              
 265              // Build friendly name
 266              $friendly_name = str_replace(array("_", "%20"), " ", $file);
 267              $friendly_name = ucwords($friendly_name);
 268              if(is_dir($real_path."/".$file))
 269              {
 270                  // Only add this gallery if there are avatars or galleries inside it (no empty directories!)
 271                  $has = 0;
 272                  $dh = @opendir($real_path."/".$file);
 273                  while(false !== ($sub_file = readdir($dh)))
 274                  {
 275                      if(preg_match("#\.(jpg|jpeg|gif|bmp|png)$#i", $sub_file) || is_dir($real_path."/".$file."/".$sub_file))
 276                      {
 277                          $has = 1;
 278                          break;
 279                      }
 280                  }
 281                  @closedir($dh);
 282                  if($has == 1)
 283                  {
 284                      $sub_galleries[] = array(
 285                          "path" => $path.$file,
 286                          "friendly_name" => $friendly_name
 287                      );
 288                  }
 289              }
 290              else if(preg_match("#\.(jpg|jpeg|gif|bmp|png)$#i", $file))
 291              {
 292                  $friendly_name = preg_replace("#\.(jpg|jpeg|gif|bmp|png)$#i", "", $friendly_name);
 293      
 294                  // Fetch dimensions
 295                  $dimensions = @getimagesize($real_path."/".$file);
 296      
 297                  $avatars[] = array(
 298                      "path" => $path.$file,
 299                      "friendly_name" => $friendly_name,
 300                      "width" => $dimensions[0],
 301                      "height" => $dimensions[1]
 302                  );
 303              }
 304          }
 305      }

 307      require_once  MYBB_ROOT."inc/functions_image.php";
 308  
 309      // Now we're done, we can simply show our gallery page
 310      echo "<div id=\"gallery_breadcrumb\">{$breadcrumb}</div>\n";
 311      echo "<div id=\"gallery\">\n";

 313      if(is_array($sub_galleries))
 314      {
 315          foreach($sub_galleries as $gallery)
 316          {
 317              if(!$gallery['thumb'])

 320                  $gallery['thumb_width'] = 64;
 321                  $gallery['thumb_height'] = 64;
 322              }
 323              else
 324              {
 325                  $gallery['thumb'] = "{$mybb->settings['avatardir']}/{$gallery['thumb']}";
 326              }
 327              $scaled_dimensions = scale_image($gallery['thumb_width'], $gallery['thumb_height'], 80, 80);
 328              $top = ceil((80-$scaled_dimensions['height'])/2);
 329              $left = ceil((80-$scaled_dimensions['width'])/2);
 330              echo "<li><a href=\"index.php?module=user-users&amp;action=avatar_gallery&amp;uid={$user['uid']}&amp;gallery={$gallery['path']}\"><span class=\"image\"><img src=\"{$gallery['thumb']}\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-top: {$top}px;\" height=\"{$scaled_dimensions['height']}\" width=\"{$scaled_dimensions['width']}\"></span><span class=\"title\">{$gallery['friendly_name']}</span></a></li>\n";
 331          }
 332      }
 333      echo "</ul>\n";
 334      // Build the list of any actual avatars we have
 335      echo "<ul id=\"avatars\">\n";
 336      if(is_array($avatars))
 337      {
 338          foreach($avatars as $avatar)
 339          {
 340              $scaled_dimensions = scale_image($avatar['width'], $avatar['height'], 80, 80);
 341              $top = ceil((80-$scaled_dimensions['height'])/2);
 342              $left = ceil((80-$scaled_dimensions['width'])/2);
 343              echo "<li><a href=\"index.php?module=user-users&amp;action=avatar_gallery&amp;uid={$user['uid']}&amp;avatar={$avatar['path']}&amp;my_post_key={$mybb->post_code}\"><span class=\"image\"><img src=\"{$mybb->settings['avatardir']}/{$avatar['path']}\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-top: {$top}px;\" height=\"{$scaled_dimensions['height']}\" width=\"{$scaled_dimensions['width']}\" /></span><span class=\"title\">{$avatar['friendly_name']}</span></a></li>\n";
 344          }
 345      }

 443  if($mybb->input['action'] == "add")

 447      if($mybb->request_method == "post")

 449          // Determine the usergroup stuff

 489          // Validate the user and get any errors that might have occurred.

 549      $form_container->output_row($lang->additional_user_groups, $lang->additional_user_groups_desc, $form->generate_select_box('additionalgroups[]', $options, $mybb->input['additionalgroups'], array('id' => 'additionalgroups', 'multiple' => true, 'size' => 5)), 'additionalgroups');

 610              "email" => $mybb->input['email'],
 611              "email2" => $mybb->input['email'],
 612              "usergroup" => $mybb->input['usergroup'],
 613              "additionalgroups" => $additionalgroups,
 614              "displaygroup" => $mybb->input['displaygroup'],
 615              "postnum" => $mybb->input['postnum'],
 616              "usertitle" => $mybb->input['usertitle'],
 617              "timezone" => $mybb->input['timezone'],
 618              "language" => $mybb->input['language'],
 619              "profile_fields" => $mybb->input['profile_fields'],
 620              "profile_fields_editable" => true,
 621              "website" => $mybb->input['website'],
 622              "icq" => $mybb->input['icq'],
 623              "aim" => $mybb->input['aim'],
 624              "yahoo" => $mybb->input['yahoo'],
 625              "msn" => $mybb->input['msn'],
 626              "birthday" => array(
 627                  "day" => $mybb->input['bday1'],
 628                  "month" => $mybb->input['bday2'],
 629                  "year" => $mybb->input['bday3']
 630              ),
 631              "style" => $mybb->input['style'],
 632              "signature" => $mybb->input['signature'],
 633              "dateformat" => intval($mybb->input['dateformat']),
 634              "timeformat" => intval($mybb->input['timeformat']),
 635              "language" => $mybb->input['language'],
 636              "usernotes" => $mybb->input['usernotes']
 637          );
 638  
 639          if($user['usergroup'] == 5 && $mybb->input['usergroup'] != 5)
 640          {
 641              if($user['coppauser'] == 1)
 642              {
 643                  $updated_user['coppa_user'] = 0;
 644              }
 645          }
 646          if($mybb->input['new_password'])
 647          {
 648              $updated_user['password'] = $mybb->input['new_password'];
 649              $updated_user['password2'] = $mybb->input['confirm_new_password'];
 650          }
 651  
 652          $updated_user['options'] = array(
 653              "allownotices" => $mybb->input['allownotices'],
 654              "hideemail" => $mybb->input['hideemail'],
 655              "subscriptionmethod" => $mybb->input['subscriptionmethod'],
 656              "invisible" => $mybb->input['invisible'],
 657              "dstcorrection" => $mybb->input['dstcorrection'],
 658              "threadmode" => $mybb->input['threadmode'],
 659              "showsigs" => $mybb->input['showsigs'],
 660              "showavatars" => $mybb->input['showavatars'],
 661              "showquickreply" => $mybb->input['showquickreply'],
 662              "receivepms" => $mybb->input['receivepms'],
 663              "receivefrombuddy" => $mybb->input['receivefrombuddy'],
 664              "pmnotice" => $mybb->input['pmnotice'],
 665              "daysprune" => $mybb->input['daysprune'],
 666              "showcodebuttons" => intval($mybb->input['showcodebuttons']),
 667              "pmnotify" => $mybb->input['pmnotify'],
 668              "showredirect" => $mybb->input['showredirect']
 669          );
 670  
 671          if($mybb->settings['usertppoptions'])
 672          {
 673              $updated_user['options']['tpp'] = intval($mybb->input['tpp']);
 674          }
 675  
 676          if($mybb->settings['userpppoptions'])
 677          {
 678              $updated_user['options']['ppp'] = intval($mybb->input['ppp']);
 679          }
 680  
 681          // Set the data of the user in the datahandler.
 682          $userhandler->set_data($updated_user);
 683          $errors = '';
 684  
 685          // Validate the user and get any errors that might have occurred.
 686          if(!$userhandler->validate_user())
 687          {
 688              $errors = $userhandler->get_friendly_errors();
 689          }
 690          else
 691          {
 692              // Are we removing an avatar from this user?
 693              if($mybb->input['remove_avatar'])
 694              {
 695                  $extra_user_updates = array(
 696                      "avatar" => "",
 697                      "avatardimensions" => "",
 698                      "avatartype" => ""
 699                  );
 700                  remove_avatars($user['uid']);
 701              }
 702              
 703              // Are we uploading a new avatar?
 704              if($_FILES['avatar_upload']['name'])
 705              {
 706                  $avatar = upload_avatar($_FILES['avatar_upload'], $user['uid']);
 707                  if($avatar['error'])
 708                  {
 709                      $errors = array($avatar['error']);
 710                  }
 711                  else
 712                  {
 713                      if($avatar['width'] > 0 && $avatar['height'] > 0)
 714                      {
 715                          $avatar_dimensions = $avatar['width']."|".$avatar['height'];
 716                      }
 717                      $extra_user_updates = array(
 718                          "avatar" => $avatar['avatar'].'?dateline='.TIME_NOW,
 719                          "avatardimensions" => $avatar_dimensions,
 720                          "avatartype" => "upload"
 721                      );
 722                  }
 723              }
 724              // Are we setting a new avatar from a URL?
 725              else if($mybb->input['avatar_url'] && $mybb->input['avatar_url'] != $user['avatar'])
 726              {
 727                  $mybb->input['avatar_url'] = preg_replace("#script:#i", "", $mybb->input['avatar_url']);
 728                  $mybb->input['avatar_url'] = htmlspecialchars($mybb->input['avatar_url']);
 729                  $ext = get_extension($mybb->input['avatar_url']);
 730  
 731                  // Copy the avatar to the local server (work around remote URL access disabled for getimagesize)
 732                  $file = fetch_remote_file($mybb->input['avatar_url']);
 733                  if(!$file)
 734                  {
 735                      $avatar_error = $lang->error_invalidavatarurl;
 736                  }
 737                  else
 738                  {
 739                      $tmp_name = "../".$mybb->settings['avataruploadpath']."/remote_".md5(random_str());
 740                      $fp = @fopen($tmp_name, "wb");
 741                      if(!$fp)
 742                      {
 743                          $avatar_error = $lang->error_invalidavatarurl;
 744                      }
 745                      else
 746                      {
 747                          fwrite($fp, $file);
 748                          fclose($fp);
 749                          list($width, $height, $type) = @getimagesize($tmp_name);
 750                          @unlink($tmp_name);
 751                          echo $type;
 752                          if(!$type)
 753                          {
 754                              $avatar_error = $lang->error_invalidavatarurl;
 755                          }
 756                      }
 757                  }
 758  
 759                  if(empty($avatar_error))
 760                  {
 761                      if($width && $height && $mybb->settings['maxavatardims'] != "")
 762                      {
 763                          list($maxwidth, $maxheight) = explode("x", my_strtolower($mybb->settings['maxavatardims']));
 764                          if(($maxwidth && $width > $maxwidth) || ($maxheight && $height > $maxheight))
 765                          {
 766                              $lang->error_avatartoobig = $lang->sprintf($lang->error_avatartoobig, $maxwidth, $maxheight);
 767                              $avatar_error = $lang->error_avatartoobig;
 768                          }
 769                      }
 770                  }
 771                  
 772                  if(empty($avatar_error))
 773                  {
 774                      if($width > 0 && $height > 0)
 775                      {
 776                          $avatar_dimensions = intval($width)."|".intval($height);
 777                      }
 778                      $extra_user_updates = array(
 779                          "avatar" => $db->escape_string($mybb->input['avatar_url'].'?dateline='.TIME_NOW),
 780                          "avatardimensions" => $avatar_dimensions,
 781                          "avatartype" => "remote"
 782                      );
 783                      remove_avatars($user['uid']);
 784                  }
 785                  else
 786                  {
 787                      $errors = array($avatar_error);
 788                  }
 789              }
 790  
 791              // Moderator "Options" (suspend signature, suspend/moderate posting)
 792              $moderator_options = array(
 793                  1 => array(
 794                      "action" => "suspendsignature", // The moderator action we're performing
 795                      "period" => "action_period", // The time period we've selected from the dropdown box
 796                      "time" => "action_time", // The time we've entered
 797                      "update_field" => "suspendsignature", // The field in the database to update if true
 798                      "update_length" => "suspendsigtime" // The length of suspension field in the database
 799                  ),
 800                  2 => array(
 801                      "action" => "moderateposting",
 802                      "period" => "modpost_period",
 803                      "time" => "modpost_time",
 804                      "update_field" => "moderateposts",
 805                      "update_length" => "moderationtime"
 806                  ),
 807                  3 => array(
 808                      "action" => "suspendposting",
 809                      "period" => "suspost_period",
 810                      "time" => "suspost_time",
 811                      "update_field" => "suspendposting",
 812                      "update_length" => "suspensiontime"
 813                  )
 814              );
 815  
 816              require_once  MYBB_ROOT."inc/functions_warnings.php";
 817              foreach($moderator_options as $option)
 818              {
 819                  if(!$mybb->input[$option['action']])
 820                  {
 821                      if($user[$option['update_field']] == 1)
 822                      {
 823                          // We're revoking the suspension
 824                          $extra_user_updates[$option['update_field']] = 0;
 825                          $extra_user_updates[$option['update_length']] = 0;
 826                      }
 827  
 828                      // Skip this option if we haven't selected it
 829                      continue;
 830                  }
 831  
 832                  if($mybb->input[$option['action']])
 833                  {
 834                      if(intval($mybb->input[$option['time']]) == 0 && $mybb->input[$option['period']] != "never" && $user[$option['update_field']] != 1)
 835                      {
 836                          // User has selected a type of ban, but not entered a valid time frame
 837                          $string = $option['action']."_error";
 838                          $errors[] = $lang->$string;
 839                      }
 840  
 841                      if(!is_array($errors))
 842                      {
 843                          $suspend_length = fetch_time_length(intval($mybb->input[$option['time']]), $mybb->input[$option['period']]);
 844      
 845                          if($user[$option['update_field']] == 1 && ($mybb->input[$option['time']] || $mybb->input[$option['period']] == "never"))
 846                          {
 847                              // We already have a suspension, but entered a new time
 848                              if($suspend_length == "-1")
 849                              {
 850                                  // Permanent ban on action
 851                                  $extra_user_updates[$option['update_length']] = 0;
 852                              }
 853                              elseif($suspend_length && $suspend_length != "-1")
 854                              {
 855                                  // Temporary ban on action
 856                                  $extra_user_updates[$option['update_length']] = TIME_NOW + $suspend_length;
 857                              }
 858                          }
 859                          elseif(!$user[$option['update_field']])
 860                          {
 861                              // New suspension for this user... bad user!
 862                              $extra_user_updates[$option['update_field']] = 1;                
 863                              if($suspend_length == "-1")
 864                              {
 865                                  $extra_user_updates[$option['update_length']] = 0;
 866                              }
 867                              else
 868                              {
 869                                  $extra_user_updates[$option['update_length']] = TIME_NOW + $suspend_length;
 870                              }
 871                          }
 872                      }
 873                  }
 874              }
 875  
 876              if($extra_user_updates['moderateposts'] && $extra_user_updates['suspendposting'])
 877              {
 878                  $errors[] = $lang->suspendmoderate_error;
 879              }
 880  
 881              if(!$errors)
 882              {
 883                  $user_info = $userhandler->update_user();
 884                  $db->update_query("users", $extra_user_updates, "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
 885                  
 886                  // if we're updating the user's signature preferences, do so now
 887                  if($mybb->input['update_posts'] == 'enable' || $mybb->input['update_posts'] == 'disable')
 888                  {
 889                      $update_signature = array(
 890                          'includesig' => ($mybb->input['update_posts'] == 'enable' ? 1 : 0)
 891                      );
 892                      $db->update_query("posts", $update_signature, "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
 893                  }
 894                  
 895                  $plugins->run_hooks("admin_user_users_edit_commit");
 896  
 897                  // Log admin action
 898                  log_admin_action($user['uid'], $mybb->input['username']);
 899  
 900                  flash_message($lang->success_user_updated, 'success');
 901                  admin_redirect("index.php?module=user-users");
 902              }
 903          }
 904      }
 905  
 906      if(!$errors)
 907      {
 908          $user['usertitle'] = htmlspecialchars_decode($user['usertitle']);
 909          $mybb->input = $user;
 910  
 911          // We need to fetch this users profile field values
 912          $query = $db->simple_select("userfields", "*", "ufid='{$user['uid']}'");
 913          $mybb->input['profile_fields'] = $db->fetch_array($query);
 914      }
 915  
 916      if($mybb->input['bday1'] || $mybb->input['bday2'] || $mybb->input['bday3'])
 917      {
 918          $mybb->input['bday'][0] = $mybb->input['bday1'];
 919          $mybb->input['bday'][1] = $mybb->input['bday2'];
 920          $mybb->input['bday'][2] = intval($mybb->input['bday3']);
 921      }
 922      else
 923      {
 924          $mybb->input['bday'] = array();
 925  
 926          if($user['birthday'])
 927          {
 928              $mybb->input['bday'] = explode('-', $user['birthday']);
 929          }
 930      }
 931  
 932      // Fetch custom profile fields
 933      $query = $db->simple_select("profilefields", "*", "", array('order_by' => 'disporder'));
 934      while($profile_field = $db->fetch_array($query))
 935      {
 936          if($profile_field['required'] == 1)
 937          {
 938              $profile_fields['required'][] = $profile_field;
 939          }
 940          else
 941          {
 942              $profile_fields['optional'][] = $profile_field;
 943          }
 944      }
 945  
 946      $page->add_breadcrumb_item($lang->edit_user.": ".htmlspecialchars_uni($user['username']));
 947      $page->output_header($lang->edit_user);
 948          
 949      $sub_tabs['edit_user'] = array(
 950          'title' => $lang->edit_user,
 951          'description' => $lang->edit_user_desc
 952      );
 953  
 954      $form = new Form("index.php?module=user-users&amp;action=edit&amp;uid={$user['uid']}", "post", "", 1);
 955      echo "<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n function submitUserForm() { $('tab_overview').up('FORM').submit(); }</script>\n";
 956  
 957      $page->output_nav_tabs($sub_tabs, 'edit_user');
 958  
 959      // If we have any error messages, show them
 960      if($errors)
 961      {
 962          $page->output_inline_error($errors);
 963      }
 964      
 965      // Is this user a COPPA user? We show a warning & activate link
 966      if($user['coppauser'])
 967      {
 968          echo $lang->sprintf($lang->warning_coppa_user, $user['uid']);
 969      }
 970  
 971      $tabs = array(
 972          "overview" => $lang->overview,
 973          "profile" => $lang->profile,
 974          "settings" => $lang->account_settings,
 975          "signature" => $lang->signature,
 976          "avatar" => $lang->avatar,
 977          "modoptions" => $lang->mod_options
 978      );
 979      $page->output_tab_control($tabs);
 980  
 981      //
 982      // OVERVIEW
 983      //
 984      echo "<div id=\"tab_overview\">\n";
 985      $table = new Table;
 986      $table->construct_header($lang->avatar, array('class' => 'align_center'));
 987      $table->construct_header($lang->general_account_stats, array('colspan' => '2', 'class' => 'align_center'));
 988  
 989      // Avatar
 990      $avatar_dimensions = explode("|", $user['avatardimensions']);
 991      if($user['avatar'])
 992      {
 993          if($user['avatardimensions'])
 994          {
 995              require_once  MYBB_ROOT."inc/functions_image.php";
 996              list($width, $height) = explode("|", $user['avatardimensions']);
 997              $scaled_dimensions = scale_image($width, $height, 120, 120);
 998          }
 999          else
1000          {
1001              $scaled_dimensions = array(
1002                  "width" => 120,
1003                  "height" => 120
1004              );
1005          }
1006          if (!stristr($user['avatar'], 'http://'))
1007          {
1008              $user['avatar'] = "../{$user['avatar']}\n";
1009          }
1010      }
1011      else
1012      {
1013          $user['avatar'] = "styles/{$page->style}/images/default_avatar.gif";
1014          $scaled_dimensions = array(
1015              "width" => 120,
1016              "height" => 120
1017          );
1018      }
1019      $avatar_top = ceil((126-$scaled_dimensions['height'])/2);
1020      if($user['lastactive'])
1021      {
1022          $last_active = my_date($mybb->settings['dateformat'], $user['lastactive']).", ".my_date($mybb->settings['timeformat'], $user['lastactive']);
1023      }
1024      else
1025      {
1026          $last_active = $lang->never;
1027      }
1028      $reg_date = my_date($mybb->settings['dateformat'], $user['regdate']).", ".my_date($mybb->settings['timeformat'], $user['regdate']);
1029      if($user['dst'] == 1)
1030      {
1031          $timezone = $user['timezone']+1;
1032      }
1033      else
1034      {
1035          $timezone = $user['timezone'];
1036      }
1037      $local_time = gmdate($mybb->settings['dateformat'], TIME_NOW + ($timezone * 3600)).", ".gmdate($mybb->settings['timeformat'], TIME_NOW + ($timezone * 3600));
1038      $days_registered = (TIME_NOW - $user['regdate']) / (24*3600);
1039      $posts_per_day = 0;
1040      if($days_registered > 0)
1041      {
1042          $posts_per_day = round($user['postnum'] / $days_registered, 2);
1043          if($posts_per_day > $user['postnum'])
1044          {
1045              $posts_per_day = $user['postnum'];
1046          }
1047      }
1048      $stats = $cache->read("stats");
1049      $posts = $stats['numposts'];
1050      if($posts == 0)
1051      {
1052          $percent_posts = "0";
1053      }
1054      else
1055      {
1056          $percent_posts = round($user['postnum']*100/$posts, 2);
1057      }
1058  
1059      $user_permissions = user_permissions($user['uid']);
1060  
1061      // Fetch the reputation for this user
1062      if($user_permissions['usereputationsystem'] == 1 && $mybb->settings['enablereputation'] == 1)
1063      {
1064          $reputation = get_reputation($user['reputation']);
1065      }
1066      else
1067      {
1068          $reputation = "-";
1069      }
1070  
1071      if($mybb->settings['enablewarningsystem'] != 0 && $user_permissions['canreceivewarnings'] != 0)
1072      {
1073          $warning_level = round($user['warningpoints']/$mybb->settings['maxwarningpoints']*100);
1074          if($warning_level > 100)
1075          {
1076              $warning_level = 100;
1077          }
1078          $warning_level = get_colored_warning_level($warning_level);
1079      }
1080  
1081      $age = $lang->na;
1082      if($user['birthday'])
1083      {
1084          $age = get_age($user['birthday']);
1085      }
1086  
1087      $table->construct_cell("<div style=\"width: 126px; height: 126px;\" class=\"user_avatar\"><img src=\"".htmlspecialchars_uni($user['avatar'])."\" style=\"margin-top: {$avatar_top}px\" width=\"{$scaled_dimensions['width']}\" height=\"{$scaled_dimensions['height']}\" alt=\"\" /></div>", array('rowspan' => 6, 'width' => 1));
1088      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->email_address}:</strong> <a href=\"mailto:".htmlspecialchars_uni($user['email'])."\">".htmlspecialchars_uni($user['email'])."</a>");
1089      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->last_active}:</strong> {$last_active}");
1090      $table->construct_row();
1091      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->registration_date}:</strong> {$reg_date}");
1092      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->local_time}:</strong> {$local_time}");
1093      $table->construct_row();
1094      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->posts}:</strong> {$user['postnum']}");
1095      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->age}:</strong> {$age}");
1096      $table->construct_row();
1097      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->posts_per_day}:</strong> {$posts_per_day}");
1098      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->reputation}:</strong> {$reputation}");
1099      $table->construct_row();
1100      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->percent_of_total_posts}:</strong> {$percent_posts}");
1101      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->warning_level}:</strong> {$warning_level}");
1102      $table->construct_row();
1103      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->registration_ip}:</strong> {$user['regip']}");
1104      $table->construct_cell("<strong>{$lang->last_known_ip}:</strong> {$user['lastip']}");
1105      $table->construct_row();
1106      
1107      $table->output("{$lang->user_overview}: {$user['username']}");
1108      echo "</div>\n";
1109  
1110      //
1111      // PROFILE
1112      //
1113      echo "<div id=\"tab_profile\">\n";
1114  
1115      $form_container = new FormContainer($lang->required_profile_info.": {$user['username']}");
1116      $form_container->output_row($lang->username." <em>*</em>", "", $form->generate_text_box('username', $mybb->input['username'], array('id' => 'username')), 'username');
1117      $form_container->output_row($lang->new_password, $lang->new_password_desc, $form->generate_password_box('new_password', $mybb->input['new_password'], array('id' => 'new_password', 'autocomplete' => 'off')), 'new_password');
1118      $form_container->output_row($lang->confirm_new_password, $lang->new_password_desc, $form->generate_password_box('confirm_new_password', $mybb->input['confirm_new_password'], array('id' => 'confirm_new_password')), 'confirm_new_password');
1119      $form_container->output_row($lang->email_address." <em>*</em>", "", $form->generate_text_box('email', $mybb->input['email'], array('id' => 'email')), 'email');
1120  
1121      $display_group_options[0] = $lang->use_primary_user_group;
1122      $query = $db->simple_select("usergroups", "gid, title", "gid != '1'", array('order_by' => 'title'));
1123      while($usergroup = $db->fetch_array($query))
1124      {
1125          $options[$usergroup['gid']] = $usergroup['title'];
1126          $display_group_options[$usergroup['gid']] = $usergroup['title'];
1127      }
1128      
1129      if(!is_array($mybb->input['additionalgroups']))
1130      {
1131          $mybb->input['additionalgroups'] = explode(',', $mybb->input['additionalgroups']);
1132      }
1133  
1134      $form_container->output_row($lang->primary_user_group." <em>*</em>", "", $form->generate_select_box('usergroup', $options, $mybb->input['usergroup'], array('id' => 'usergroup')), 'usergroup');
1135      $form_container->output_row($lang->additional_user_groups, $lang->additional_user_groups_desc, $form->generate_select_box('additionalgroups[]', $options, $mybb->input['additionalgroups'], array('id' => 'additionalgroups', 'multiple' => true, 'size' => 5)), 'additionalgroups');
1136      $form_container->output_row($lang->display_user_group." <em>*</em>", "", $form->generate_select_box('displaygroup', $display_group_options, $mybb->input['displaygroup'], array('id' => 'displaygroup')), 'displaygroup');
1137      $form_container->output_row($lang->post_count." <em>*</em>", "", $form->generate_text_box('postnum', $mybb->input['postnum'], array('id' => 'postnum')), 'postnum');
1138  
1139      // Output custom profile fields - required
1140      output_custom_profile_fields($profile_fields['required'], $mybb->input['profile_fields'], $form_container, $form);
1141  
1142      $form_container->end();

1569  {
1570      if(action == "modpost")
1571      {
1572          $("suspendposting").checked = false;
1573          $("suspost").hide();
1574          
1575          if($("moderateposting").checked == true)
1576          {
1577              $("modpost").show();
1578          }
1579          else if($("moderateposting").checked == false)
1580          {
1581              $("modpost").hide();
1582          }        
1583      }
1584      else if(action == "suspost")
1585      {
1586          $("moderateposting").checked = false;
1587          $("modpost").hide();
1588  
1589          if($("suspendposting").checked == true)
1590          {
1591              $("suspost").show();
1592          }
1593          else if($("suspendposting").checked == false)
1594          {
1595              $("suspost").hide();
1596          }
1597      }
1598  }
1599  
1600  if($("moderateposting").checked == false)
1601  {
1602      $("modpost").hide();
1603  }
1604  else
1605  {
1606      $("modpost").show();
1607  }
1608  
1609  if($("suspendposting").checked == false)
1610  {
1611      $("suspost").hide();
1612  }
1613  else
1614  {
1615      $("suspost").show();
1616  }
1617  
1618  // -->
1619  </script>';
1620  
1621      $page->output_footer();
1622  }

1625  {
1626      $plugins->run_hooks("admin_user_users_delete");
1627      
1628      $query = $db->simple_select("users", "*", "uid='".intval($mybb->input['uid'])."'");
1629      $user = $db->fetch_array($query);
1630  
1631      // Does the user not exist?
1632      if(!$user['uid'])
1633      {
1634          flash_message($lang->error_invalid_user, 'error');
1635          admin_redirect("index.php?module=user-users");
1636      }
1637      
1638      if(is_super_admin($mybb->input['uid']) && $mybb->user['uid'] != $mybb->input['uid'] && !is_super_admin($mybb->user['uid']))
1639      {
1640          flash_message($lang->error_no_perms_super_admin, 'error');
1641          admin_redirect("index.php?module=user-users");
1642      }

1647          admin_redirect("index.php?module=user-users");
1648      }
1649  
1650      if($mybb->request_method == "post")
1651      {
1652          // Delete the user
1653          $db->delete_query("userfields", "ufid='{$user['uid']}'");
1654          $db->delete_query("privatemessages", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1655          $db->delete_query("events", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1656          $db->delete_query("forumsubscriptions", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1657          $db->delete_query("threadsubscriptions", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1658          $db->delete_query("sessions", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1659          $db->delete_query("banned", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1660          $db->delete_query("threadratings", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1661          $db->delete_query("users", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1662          $db->delete_query("joinrequests", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1663          $db->delete_query("warnings", "uid='{$user['uid']}'");

1666          $db->delete_query("posts", "uid = '{$user['uid']}' AND visible = '-2'");
1667          $db->delete_query("threads", "uid = '{$user['uid']}' AND visible = '-2'");
1668  
1669          // Update forum stats
1670          update_stats(array('numusers' => '-1'));
1671  
1672          // Update forums & threads if user is the lastposter
1673          $db->update_query("posts", array('uid' => 0), "uid='{$user['uid']}'");
1674          $db->update_query("forums", array("lastposteruid" => 0), "lastposteruid = '{$user['uid']}'");
1675          $db->update_query("threads", array("lastposteruid" => 0), "lastposteruid = '{$user['uid']}'");
1676  
1677          // Did this user have an uploaded avatar?
1678          if($user['avatartype'] == "upload")
1679          {
1680              // Removes the ./ at the beginning the timestamp on the end...
1681              @unlink("../".substr($user['avatar'], 2, -20));
1682          }
1683  
1684          // Was this user a moderator?
1685          if(is_moderator($user['uid']))
1686          {
1687              $db->delete_query("moderators", "id='{$user['uid']}' AND isgroup = '0'");
1688              $cache->update_moderators();
1689          }
1690  
1691          $plugins->run_hooks("admin_user_users_delete_commit");
1692  
1693          // Log admin action
1694          log_admin_action($user['uid'], $user['username']);
1695  
1696          flash_message($lang->success_user_deleted, 'success');
1697          admin_redirect("index.php?module=user-users");
1698      }
1699      else
1700      {
1701          $page->output_confirm_action("index.php?module=user-users&action=delete&uid={$user['uid']}", $lang->user_deletion_confirmation);
1702      }
1703  }

1828  if($mybb->input['action'] == "merge")
1829  {
1830      $plugins->run_hooks("admin_user_users_merge");
1831      
1832      if($mybb->request_method == "post")
1833      {
1834          $query = $db->simple_select("users", "*", "LOWER(username)='".$db->escape_string(my_strtolower($mybb->input['source_username']))."'");
1835          $source_user = $db->fetch_array($query);
1836          if(!$source_user['uid'])
1837          {
1838              $errors[] = $lang->error_invalid_user_source;
1839          }
1840  
1841          $query = $db->simple_select("users", "*", "LOWER(username)='".$db->escape_string(my_strtolower($mybb->input['destination_username']))."'");
1842          $destination_user = $db->fetch_array($query);
1843          if(!$destination_user['uid'])
1844          {
1845              $errors[] = $lang->error_invalid_user_destination;
1846          }
1847          
1848          // If we're not a super admin and we're merging a source super admin or a destination super admin then dissallow this action
1849          if(!is_super_admin($mybb->user['uid']) && (is_super_admin($source_user['uid']) || is_super_admin($destination_user['uid'])))
1850          {
1851              flash_message($lang->error_no_perms_super_admin, 'error');
1852              admin_redirect("index.php?module=user-users");
1853          }
1854  
1855          if($source_user['uid'] == $destination_user['uid'])
1856          {
1857              $errors[] = $lang->error_cannot_merge_same_account;
1858          }
1859  
1860          if(empty($errors))
1861          {
1862              // Begin to merge the accounts
1863              $uid_update = array(
1864                  "uid" => $destination_user['uid']
1865              );
1866              $query = $db->simple_select("adminoptions", "uid", "uid='{$destination_user['uid']}'");
1867              $existing_admin_options = $db->fetch_field($query, "uid");
1868  
1869              // Only carry over admin options/permissions if we don't already have them
1870              if(!$existing_admin_options)
1871              {
1872                  $db->update_query("adminoptions", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1873              }
1874              
1875              $db->update_query("adminlog", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1876              $db->update_query("announcements", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1877              $db->update_query("events", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1878              $db->update_query("threadsubscriptions", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1879              $db->update_query("forumsubscriptions", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1880              $db->update_query("joinrequests", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1881              $db->update_query("moderatorlog", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1882              $db->update_query("pollvotes", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1883              $db->update_query("posts", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1884              $db->update_query("privatemessages", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1885              $db->update_query("reportedposts", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1886              $db->update_query("threadratings", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1887              $db->update_query("threads", $uid_update, "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1888              $db->delete_query("sessions", "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1889  
1890              // Is the source user a moderator?
1891              if($groupscache[$source_user['usergroup']]['canmodcp'])
1892              {
1893                  $db->delete_query("moderators", "id='{$source_user['uid']}' AND isgroup = '0'");
1894  
1895                  // Update the moderator cache...
1896                  $cache->update_moderators();
1897              }
1898  
1899              // Forums & Threads
1900              $db->update_query("forums", array("lastposteruid" => $destination_user['uid']), "lastposteruid = '{$source_user['uid']}'");
1901              $db->update_query("threads", array("lastposteruid" => $destination_user['uid']), "lastposteruid = '{$source_user['uid']}'");
1902  
1903              // Banning
1904              $db->update_query("banned", array('admin' => $destination_user['uid']), "admin = '{$source_user['uid']}'");
1905  
1906              // Merging Reputation
1907              // First, let's change all the details over to our new user...
1908              $rep_update = array(
1909                  "adduid" => $destination_user['uid'],
1910                  "uid" => $destination_user['uid']
1911              );
1912              $db->update_query("reputation", $rep_update, "adduid = '".$source_user['uid']."' OR uid = '".$source_user['uid']."'");
1913  
1914              // Now that all the repuation is merged, figure out what to do with this user's comments...
1915              $options = array(
1916                  "order_by" => "uid",
1917                  "order_dir" => "ASC"
1918              );
1919  
1920              $to_remove = array();
1921              $query = $db->simple_select("reputation", "*", "adduid = '".$destination_user['uid']."'");
1922              while($rep = $db->fetch_array($query))
1923              {
1924                  if($rep['pid'] == 0 && $mybb->settings['multirep'] == 0 && $last_result['uid'] == $rep['uid'])
1925                  {
1926                      // Multiple reputation is disallowed, and this isn't a post, so let's remove this comment
1927                      $to_remove[] = $rep['rid'];
1928                  }
1929  
1930                  // Remove comments or posts liked by "me"
1931                  if($last_result['uid'] == $destination_user['uid'] || $rep['uid'] == $destination_user['uid'])
1932                  {
1933                      if(!in_array($rep['rid'], $to_remove))
1934                      {
1935                          $to_remove[] = $rep['rid'];
1936                          continue;
1937                      }
1938                  }
1939  
1940                  $last_result = array(
1941                      "rid" => $rep['rid'],
1942                      "uid" => $rep['uid']
1943                  );
1944              }
1945  
1946              // Remove any reputations we've selected to remove...
1947              if(!empty($to_remove))
1948              {
1949                  $imp = implode(",", $to_remove);
1950                  $db->delete_query("reputation", "rid IN (".$imp.")");
1951              }
1952  
1953              // Calculate the new reputation for this user...
1954              $query = $db->simple_select("reputation", "SUM(reputation) as total_rep", "uid='{$destination_user['uid']}'");
1955              $total_reputation = $db->fetch_field($query, "total_rep");
1956  
1957              $db->update_query("users", array('reputation' => intval($total_reputation)), "uid='{$destination_user['uid']}'");
1958  
1959              // Additional updates for non-uid fields
1960              $last_poster = array(
1961                  "lastposteruid" => $destination_user['uid'],
1962                  "lastposter" => $db->escape_string($destination_user['username'])
1963              );
1964              $db->update_query("forums", $last_poster, "lastposteruid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1965              $db->update_query("threads", $last_poster, "lastposteruid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1966              $edit_uid = array(
1967                  "edituid" => $destination_user['uid']
1968              );
1969              $db->update_query("posts", $edit_uid, "edituid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1970  
1971              $from_uid = array(
1972                  "fromid" => $destination_user['uid']
1973              );    
1974              $db->update_query("privatemessages", $from_uid, "fromid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1975              $to_uid = array(
1976                  "toid" => $destination_user['uid']
1977              );    
1978              $db->update_query("privatemessages", $to_uid, "toid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1979  
1980              // Delete the old user
1981              $db->delete_query("users", "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1982              $db->delete_query("banned", "uid='{$source_user['uid']}'");
1983              
1984              // Get a list of forums where post count doesn't apply
1985              $fids = array();
1986              $query = $db->simple_select("forums", "fid", "usepostcounts=0");
1987              while($fid = $db->fetch_field($query, "fid"))
1988              {
1989                  $fids[] = $fid;
1990              }
1991              
1992              $fids_not_in = '';
1993              if(!empty($fids))
1994              {
1995                  $fids_not_in = "AND fid NOT IN(".implode(',', $fids).")";
1996              }
1997              
1998              // Update user post count
1999              $query = $db->simple_select("posts", "COUNT(*) AS postnum", "uid='".$destination_user['uid']."' {$fids_not_in}");
2000              $num = $db->fetch_array($query);
2001              $updated_count = array(
2002                  "postnum" => $num['postnum']
2003              );
2004              $db->update_query("users", $updated_count, "uid='{$destination_user['uid']}'");
2005              
2006              // Use the earliest registration date
2007              if($destination_user['regdate'] > $source_user['regdate'])
2008              {
2009                  $db->update_query("users", array('regdate' => $source_user['regdate']), "uid='{$destination_user['uid']}'");
2010              }
2011  
2012              update_stats(array('numusers' => '-1'));
2013              
2014              $plugins->run_hooks("admin_user_users_merge_commit");
2015  
2016              // Log admin action
2017              log_admin_action($source_user['uid'], $source_user['username'], $destination_user['uid'], $destination_user['username']);
2018  
2019              // Redirect!
2020              flash_message("<strong>{$source_user['username']}</strong> {$lang->success_merged} {$destination_user['username']}", "success");
2021              admin_redirect("index.php?module=user-users");
2022              exit;
2023          }
2024      }
2025  
2026      $page->add_breadcrumb_item($lang->merge_users);
2027      $page->output_header($lang->merge_users);
2028      
2029      $page->output_nav_tabs($sub_tabs, 'merge_users');
2030  
2031      // If we have any error messages, show them
2032      if($errors)
2033      {
2034          $page->output_inline_error($errors);
2035      }
2036  
2037      $form = new Form("index.php?module=user-users&amp;action=merge", "post");
2038  
2039      $form_container = new FormContainer($lang->merge_users);
2040      $form_container->output_row($lang->source_account." <em>*</em>", $lang->source_account_desc, $form->generate_text_box('source_username', $mybb->input['source_username'], array('id' => 'source_username')), 'source_username');
2041      $form_container->output_row($lang->destination_account." <em>*</em>", $lang->destination_account_desc, $form->generate_text_box('destination_username', $mybb->input['destination_username'], array('id' => 'destination_username')), 'destination_username');
2042      $form_container->end();
2043  
2044      // Autocompletion for usernames
2045      echo '
2046      <script type="text/javascript" src="../jscripts/autocomplete.js?ver=140"></script>
2047      <script type="text/javascript">
2048      <!--
2049          new autoComplete("source_username", "../xmlhttp.php?action=get_users", {valueSpan: "username"});
2050          new autoComplete("destination_username", "../xmlhttp.php?action=get_users", {valueSpan: "username"});
2051      // -->
2052      </script>';
2053  
2054      $buttons[] = $form->generate_submit_button($lang->merge_user_accounts);
2055      $form->output_submit_wrapper($buttons);
2056      $form->end();
2057  
2058      $page->output_footer();
2059  }

2061  if($mybb->input['action'] == "search")
2062  {
2063      $plugins->run_hooks("admin_user_users_search");
2064      
2065      if($mybb->request_method == "post" || $mybb->input['results'] == 1)
2066      {
2067          // Build view options from incoming search options
2068          if($mybb->input['vid'])

2960  
2961  function build_users_view($view)
2962  {
2963      global $mybb, $db, $cache, $lang, $user_view_fields, $page;
2964  
2965      if($view['title'])
2966      {
2967          $title_string = "view_title_{$view['vid']}";
2968          
2969          if($lang->$title_string)
2970          {
2971              $view['title'] = $lang->$title_string;
2972          }
2973          
2974          $view_title .= " (".htmlspecialchars_uni($view['title']).")";
2975      }
2976  
2977      // Build the URL to this view
2978      if(!$view['url'])
2979      {
2980          $view['url'] = "index.php?module=user-users";
2981      }
2982      if(!is_array($view['conditions']))
2983      {
2984          $view['conditions'] = unserialize($view['conditions']);
2985      }
2986      if(!is_array($view['fields']))
2987      {
2988          $view['fields'] = unserialize($view['fields']);
2989      }
2990      if(!is_array($view['custom_profile_fields']))
2991      {
2992          $view['custom_profile_fields'] = unserialize($view['custom_profile_fields']);
2993      }
2994      if($mybb->input['username'])
2995      {
2996          $view['conditions']['username'] = $mybb->input['username'];
2997      }
2998      if($view['vid'])
2999      {
3000          $view['url'] .= "&amp;vid={$view['vid']}";
3001      }
3002      else
3003      {
3004          // If this is a custom view we need to save everything ready to pass it on from page to page
3005          global $admin_session;
3006          if(!$_REQUEST['search_id'])
3007          {
3008              $search_id = md5(random_str());
3009              $admin_session['data']['user_views'][$search_id] = $view;
3010              update_admin_session('user_views', $admin_session['data']['user_views']);
3011              $_REQUEST['search_id'] = $search_id;
3012          }
3013          $view['url'] .= "&amp;search_id=".htmlspecialchars($_REQUEST['search_id']);
3014      }
3015      
3016      if($mybb->input['username'])
3017      {
3018          $view['url'] .= "&amp;username=".urlencode(htmlspecialchars_uni($mybb->input['username']));
3019      }
3020      
3021      if(!isset($admin_session['data']['last_users_view']) || $admin_session['data']['last_users_view'] != str_replace("&amp;", "&", $view['url']))
3022      {
3023          update_admin_session('last_users_url', str_replace("&amp;", "&", $view['url']));
3024      }
3025      
3026      if(isset($view['conditions']['referrer'])){
3027          $view['url'] .= "&amp;action=referrers&amp;uid=".htmlspecialchars($view['conditions']['referrer']);
3028      }
3029      
3030      // Do we not have any views?
3031      if(empty($view))
3032      {
3033          return false;
3034      }
3035      
3036      $table = new Table;
3037  
3038      // Build header for table based view
3039      if($view['view_type'] != "card")
3040      {
3041          foreach($view['fields'] as $field)
3042          {
3043              if(!$user_view_fields[$field])
3044              {
3045                  continue;
3046              }
3047              $view_field = $user_view_fields[$field];
3048              $field_options = array();
3049              if($view_field['width'])
3050              {
3051                  $field_options['width'] = $view_field['width'];
3052              }
3053              if($view_field['align'])
3054              {
3055                  $field_options['class'] = "align_".$view_field['align'];
3056              }
3057              $table->construct_header($view_field['title'], $field_options);
3058          }
3059          $table->construct_header("<input type=\"checkbox\" name=\"allbox\" onclick=\"inlineModeration.checkAll(this);\" />"); // Create a header for the "select" boxes
3060      }
3061  
3062      $search_sql = '1=1';
3063  
3064      // Build the search SQL for users
3065  
3066      // List of valid LIKE search fields
3067      $user_like_fields = array("username", "email", "website", "icq", "aim", "yahoo", "msn", "signature", "usertitle");
3068      foreach($user_like_fields as $search_field)
3069      {
3070          if($view['conditions'][$search_field] && !$view['conditions'][$search_field.'_blank'])
3071          {
3072              $search_sql .= " AND u.{$search_field} LIKE '%".$db->escape_string_like($view['conditions'][$search_field])."%'";
3073          }
3074          else if(isset($view['conditions'][$search_field.'_blank']))
3075          {
3076              $search_sql .= " AND u.{$search_field} != ''";
3077          }
3078      }
3079  
3080      // EXACT matching fields
3081      $user_exact_fields = array("referrer");
3082      foreach($user_exact_fields as $search_field)
3083      {
3084          if($view['conditions'][$search_field])
3085          {
3086              $search_sql .= " AND u.{$search_field}='".$db->escape_string($view['conditions'][$search_field])."'";
3087          }
3088      }
3089  
3090      // LESS THAN or GREATER THAN
3091      $direction_fields = array("postnum");
3092      foreach($direction_fields as $search_field)
3093      {
3094          $direction_field = $search_field."_dir";
3095          if(($view['conditions'][$search_field] || $view['conditions'][$search_field] === '0') && $view['conditions'][$direction_field])
3096          {
3097              switch($view['conditions'][$direction_field])
3098              {
3099                  case "greater_than":
3100                      $direction = ">";
3101                      break;
3102                  case "less_than":
3103                      $direction = "<";
3104                      break;
3105                  default:
3106                      $direction = "=";
3107              }
3108              $search_sql .= " AND u.{$search_field}{$direction}'".$db->escape_string($view['conditions'][$search_field])."'";
3109          }
3110      }
3111  
3112      // Registration searching
3113      $reg_fields = array("regdate");
3114      foreach($reg_fields as $search_field)
3115      {
3116          if(intval($view['conditions'][$search_field]))
3117          {
3118              $threshold = TIME_NOW - (intval($view['conditions'][$search_field]) * 24 * 60 * 60);
3119  
3120              $search_sql .= " AND u.{$search_field} >= '{$threshold}'";
3121          }
3122      }
3123  
3124      // IP searching
3125      $ip_fields = array("regip", "lastip");
3126      foreach($ip_fields as $search_field)
3127      {
3128          if($view['conditions'][$search_field])
3129          {
3130              // IPv6 IP
3131              if(strpos($view['conditions'][$search_field], ":") !== false)
3132              {
3133                  $view['conditions'][$search_field] = str_replace("*", "%", $view['conditions'][$search_field]);
3134                  $ip_sql = "{$search_field} LIKE '".$db->escape_string($view['conditions'][$search_field])."'";
3135              }
3136              else
3137              {
3138                  $ip_range = fetch_longipv4_range($view['conditions'][$search_field]);
3139                  if(!is_array($ip_range))
3140                  {
3141                      $ip_sql = "long{$search_field}='{$ip_range}'";
3142                  }
3143                  else
3144                  {
3145                      $ip_sql = "long{$search_field} > '{$ip_range[0]}' AND long{$search_field} < '{$ip_range[1]}'";
3146                  }
3147              }
3148              $search_sql .= " AND {$ip_sql}";
3149          }
3150      }
3151  
3152      // Post IP searching
3153      if($view['conditions']['postip'])
3154      {
3155          // IPv6 IP
3156          if(strpos($view['conditions']['postip'], ":") !== false)
3157          {
3158              $view['conditions']['postip'] = str_replace("*", "%", $view['conditions']['postip']);
3159              $ip_sql = "ipaddress LIKE '".$db->escape_string($view['conditions']['postip'])."'";
3160          }
3161          else
3162          {
3163              $ip_range = fetch_longipv4_range($view['conditions']['postip']);
3164              if(!is_array($ip_range))
3165              {
3166                  $ip_sql = "longipaddress='{$ip_range}'";
3167              }
3168              else
3169              {
3170                  $ip_sql = "longipaddress > '{$ip_range[0]}' AND longipaddress < '{$ip_range[1]}'";
3171              }
3172          }
3173          $ip_uids = array(0);
3174          $query = $db->simple_select("posts", "uid", $ip_sql);
3175          while($uid = $db->fetch_field($query, "uid"))
3176          {
3177              $ip_uids[] = $uid;
3178          }
3179          $search_sql .= " AND u.uid IN(".implode(',', $ip_uids).")";
3180          unset($ip_uids);
3181      }
3182      
3183      // Custom Profile Field searching
3184      if($view['custom_profile_fields'])
3185      {
3186          $userfield_sql = '1=1';

3199                      {

3204                      {
3205                          $column = str_replace('_blank', '', $column);

3207                      }
3208                      else
3209                      {
3210                          $userfield_sql .= ' AND '.$db->escape_string($column)."='".$db->escape_string($value)."'";

3610  
3611  function build_user_view_card($user, $view, &$i)
3612  {
3613      global $user_view_fields;
3614  
3615      ++$i;
3616      if($i == 3)
3617      {
3618          $i = 1;
3619      }
3620  
3621      // Loop through fields user wants to show
3622      foreach($view['fields'] as $field)
3623      {
3624          if(!$user_view_fields[$field])
3625          {
3626              continue;
3627          }
3628  
3629          $view_field = $user_view_fields[$field];
3630          
3631          // Special conditions for avatar
3632          if($field == "avatar")
3633          {
3634              $avatar = $user['view']['avatar'];
3635          }
3636          else if($field == "controls")
3637          {
3638              $controls = $user['view']['controls'];
3639          }
3640          // Otherwise, just user data
3641          else if($field != "username")
3642          {
3643              if($user['view'][$field])
3644              {
3645                  $value = $user['view'][$field];
3646              }
3647              else
3648              {
3649                  $value = $user[$field];
3650              }
3651              
3652              if($field == "postnum")
3653              {
3654                  $value = my_number_format($value);
3655              }
3656              
3657              $user_details[] = "<strong>{$view_field['title']}:</strong> {$value}";
3658          }
3659  
3660      }
3661      // Floated to the left or right?
3662      if($i == 1)
3663      {
3664          $float = "left";
3665      }
3666      else
3667      {
3668          $float = "right";
3669      }
3670  
3671      // And build the final card
3672      $card = "<fieldset id=\"uid_{$user['uid']}\" style=\"width: 47%; float: {$float};\">\n";
3673      $card .= "<legend><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"checkbox\" name=\"inlinemod_{$user['uid']}\" id=\"inlinemod_{$user['uid']}\" value=\"1\" onclick=\"$('uid_{$user['uid']}').toggleClassName('inline_selected');\" /> {$user['view']['username']}</legend>\n";
3674      if($avatar)
3675      {
3676          $card .= "<div class=\"user_avatar\">{$avatar}</div>\n";
3677      }
3678      if($user_details)
3679      {
3680          $card .= "<div class=\"user_details\">".implode("<br />", $user_details)."</div>\n";
3681      }
3682      if($controls)
3683      {
3684          $card .= "<div class=\"float_right\" style=\"padding: 4px;\">{$controls}</div>\n";
3685      }
3686      $card .= "</fieldset>";
3687      return $card;
3688  
3689  }
3690  
3691  function build_user_view_table($user, $view, &$table)
3692  {
3693      global $user_view_fields;
3694  
3695      foreach($view['fields'] as $field)
3696      {
3697          if(!$user_view_fields[$field])
3698          {
3699              continue;
3700          }
3701          $view_field = $user_view_fields[$field];
3702          $field_options = array();
3703          if($view_field['align'])
3704          {
3705              $field_options['class'] = "align_".$view_field['align'];
3706          }
3707          if($user['view'][$field])
3708          {
3709              $value = $user['view'][$field];
3710          }
3711          else
3712          {
3713              $value = $user[$field];
3714          }
3715          $table->construct_cell($value, $field_options);
3716      }
3717  
3718      $table->construct_cell("<input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"checkbox\" name=\"inlinemod_{$user['uid']}\" id=\"inlinemod_{$user['uid']}\" value=\"1\" onclick=\"$('uid_{$user['uid']}').toggleClassName('inline_selected');\" />");
3719  
3720      $table->construct_row();
3721  }

3723  function fetch_scaled_avatar($user, $max_width=80, $max_height=80)
3724  {
3725      $scaled_dimensions = array(
3726          "width" => $max_width,
3727          "height" => $max_height,
3728      );
3729  
3730      if($user['avatar'])
3731      {
3732          if($user['avatardimensions'])
3733          {
3734              require_once  MYBB_ROOT."inc/functions_image.php";
3735              list($width, $height) = explode("|", $user['avatardimensions']);
3736              $scaled_dimensions = scale_image($width, $height, $max_width, $max_height);
3737          }
3738      }
3739  
3740      return array("width" => $scaled_dimensions['width'], "height" => $scaled_dimensions['height']);
3741  }
3742  
3743  function output_custom_profile_fields($fields, $values, &$form_container, &$form, $search=false)
3744  {
3745      global $lang;
3746      
3747      if(!is_array($fields))
3748      {
3749          return;
3750      }
3751      foreach($fields as $profile_field)
3752      {
3753          $profile_field['type'] = htmlspecialchars_uni($profile_field['type']);
3754          list($type, $options) = explode("\n", $profile_field['type'], 2);
3755          $type = trim($type);
3756          $field_name = "fid{$profile_field['fid']}";
3757  
3758          switch($type)
3759          {
3760              case "multiselect":
3761                  if(!is_array($values[$field_name]))
3762                  {
3763                      $user_options = explode("\n", $values[$field_name]);
3764                  }
3765                  else
3766                  {
3767                      $user_options = $values[$field_name];
3768                  }
3769  
3770                  foreach($user_options as $val)
3771                  {
3772                      $selected_options[$val] = $val;
3773                  }
3774  
3775                  $select_options = explode("\n", $options);
3776                  $options = array();
3777                  if($search == true)
3778                  {
3779                      $select_options[''] = $lang->na;
3780                  }
3781                  
3782                  foreach($select_options as $val)
3783                  {
3784                      $val = trim($val);
3785                      $options[$val] = $val;
3786                  }
3787                  if(!$profile_field['length'])
3788                  {
3789                      $profile_field['length'] = 3;
3790                  }
3791                  $code = $form->generate_select_box("profile_fields[{$field_name}][]", $options, $selected_options, array('id' => "profile_field_{$field_name}", 'multiple' => true, 'size' => $profile_field['length']));
3792                  break;
3793              case "select":
3794                  $select_options = array();
3795                  if($search == true)
3796                  {
3797                      $select_options[''] = $lang->na;
3798                  }
3799                  $select_options += explode("\n", $options);
3800                  $options = array();
3801                  foreach($select_options as $val)
3802                  {
3803                      $val = trim($val);
3804                      $options[$val] = $val;
3805                  }
3806                  if(!$profile_field['length'])
3807                  {
3808                      $profile_field['length'] = 1;
3809                  }
3810                  if($search == true)
3811                  {
3812                      $code = $form->generate_select_box("profile_fields[{$field_name}][{$field_name}]", $options, $values[$field_name], array('id' => "profile_field_{$field_name}", 'size' => $profile_field['length']));
3813                  }
3814                  else
3815                  {
3816                      $code = $form->generate_select_box("profile_fields[{$field_name}]", $options, $values[$field_name], array('id' => "profile_field_{$field_name}", 'size' => $profile_field['length']));
3817                  }
3818                  break;
3819              case "radio":
3820                  $radio_options = array();
3821                  if($search == true)
3822                  {
3823                      $radio_options[''] = $lang->na;
3824                  }
3825                  $radio_options += explode("\n", $options);
3826                  foreach($radio_options as $val)
3827                  {
3828                      $val = trim($val);
3829                      $code .= $form->generate_radio_button("profile_fields[{$field_name}]", $val, $val, array('id' => "profile_field_{$field_name}", 'checked' => ($val == $values[$field_name] ? true : false)))."<br />";
3830                  }
3831                  break;
3832              case "checkbox":
3833                  if(!is_array($values[$field_name]))
3834                  {
3835                      $user_options = explode("\n", $values[$field_name]);
3836                  }
3837                  else
3838                  {
3839                      $user_options = $values[$field_name];
3840                  }
3841                  foreach($user_options as $val)
3842                  {
3843                      $selected_options[$val] = $val;
3844                  }
3845                  $select_options = array();
3846                  if($search == true)
3847                  {
3848                      $select_options[''] = $lang->na;
3849                  }
3850                  $select_options += explode("\n", $options);
3851                  foreach($select_options as $val)
3852                  {
3853                      $val = trim($val);
3854                      $code .= $form->generate_check_box("profile_fields[{$field_name}][]", $val, $val, array('id' => "profile_field_{$field_name}", 'checked' => ($val == $selected_options[$val] ? true : false)))."<br />";
3855                  }
3856                  break;
3857              case "textarea":
3858                  $extra = '';
3859                  if($mybb->input['action'] == "search")
3860                  {
3861                      $extra = " {$lang->or} ".$form->generate_check_box("profile_fields[{$field_name}_blank]", 1, $lang->is_not_blank, array('id' => "{$field_name}_blank", 'checked' => $values[$field_name.'_blank']));
3862                  }
3863  
3864                  $code = $form->generate_text_area("profile_fields[{$field_name}]", $values[$field_name], array('id' => "profile_field_{$field_name}", 'rows' => 6, 'cols' => 50)).$extra;
3865                  break;
3866              default:
3867                  $extra = '';
3868                  if($mybb->input['action'] == "search")
3869                  {
3870                      $extra = " {$lang->or} ".$form->generate_check_box("profile_fields[{$field_name}_blank]", 1, $lang->is_not_blank, array('id' => "{$field_name}_blank", 'checked' => $values[$field_name.'_blank']));
3871                  }
3872  
3873                  $code = $form->generate_text_box("profile_fields[{$field_name}]", $values[$field_name], array('id' => "profile_field_{$field_name}", 'maxlength' => $profile_field['maxlength'], 'length' => $profile_field['length'])).$extra;
3874                  break;
3875          }
3876  
3877          $form_container->output_row($profile_field['name'], $profile_field['description'], $code, "", array('id' => "profile_field_{$field_name}"));
3878          $code = $user_options = $selected_options = $radio_options = $val = $options = '';
3879      }
3880  }

3882  function user_search_conditions($input=array(), &$form)
3883  {
3884      global $mybb, $db, $lang;
3885  
3886      if(!$input)
3887      {
3888          $input = $mybb->input;
3889      }
3890      
3891      if(!is_array($input['conditions']))
3892      {
3893          $input['conditions'] = unserialize($input['conditions']);
3894      }
3895      
3896      if(!is_array($input['profile_fields']))
3897      {
3898          $input['profile_fields'] = unserialize($input['profile_fields']);
3899      }
3900      
3901      if(!is_array($input['fields']))
3902      {
3903          $input['fields'] = unserialize($input['fields']);
3904      }
3905      
3906      $form_container = new FormContainer($lang->find_users_where);
3907      $form_container->output_row($lang->username_contains, "", $form->generate_text_box('conditions[username]', $input['conditions']['username'], array('id' => 'username')), 'username');
3908      $form_container->output_row($lang->email_address_contains, "", $form->generate_text_box('conditions[email]', $input['conditions']['email'], array('id' => 'email')), 'email');
3909  
3910      $query = $db->simple_select("usergroups", "gid, title", "gid != '1'", array('order_by' => 'title'));
3911      while($usergroup = $db->fetch_array($query))
3912      {
3913          $options[$usergroup['gid']] = $usergroup['title'];
3914      }
3915  
3916      $form_container->output_row($lang->is_member_of_groups, $lang->additional_user_groups_desc, $form->generate_select_box('conditions[usergroup][]', $options, $input['conditions']['usergroup'], array('id' => 'usergroups', 'multiple' => true, 'size' => 5)), 'usergroups');
3917  
3918      $form_container->output_row($lang->website_contains, "", $form->generate_text_box('conditions[website]', $input['conditions']['website'], array('id' => 'website'))." {$lang->or} ".$form->generate_check_box('conditions[website_blank]', 1, $lang->is_not_blank, array('id' => 'website_blank', 'checked' => $input['conditions']['website_blank'])), 'website');
3919      $form_container->output_row($lang->icq_number_contains, "", $form->generate_text_box('conditions[icq]', $input['conditions']['icq'], array('id' => 'icq'))." {$lang->or} ".$form->generate_check_box('conditions[icq_blank]', 1, $lang->is_not_blank, array('id' => 'icq_blank', 'checked' => $input['conditions']['icq_blank'])), 'icq');
3920      $form_container->output_row($lang->aim_handle_contains, "", $form->generate_text_box('conditions[aim]', $input['conditions']['aim'], array('id' => 'aim'))." {$lang->or} ".$form->generate_check_box('conditions[aim_blank]', 1, $lang->is_not_blank, array('id' => 'aim_blank', 'checked' => $input['conditions']['aim_blank'])), 'aim');
3921      $form_container->output_row($lang->yahoo_contains, "", $form->generate_text_box('conditions[yahoo]', $input['conditions']['yahoo'], array('id' => 'yahoo'))." {$lang->or} ".$form->generate_check_box('conditions[yahoo_blank]', 1, $lang->is_not_blank, array('id' => 'yahoo_blank', 'checked' => $input['conditions']['yahoo_blank'])), 'yahoo');
3922      $form_container->output_row($lang->msn_contains, "", $form->generate_text_box('conditions[msn]', $input['conditions']['msn'], array('id' => 'msn'))." {$lang->or} ".$form->generate_check_box('conditions[msn_blank]', 1, $lang->is_not_blank, array('id' => 'msn_blank', 'checked' => $input['conditions']['msn_blank'])), 'msn');
3923      $form_container->output_row($lang->signature_contains, "", $form->generate_text_box('conditions[signature]', $input['conditions']['signature'], array('id' => 'signature'))." {$lang->or} ".$form->generate_check_box('conditions[signature_blank]', 1, $lang->is_not_blank, array('id' => 'signature_blank', 'checked' => $input['conditions']['signature_blank'])), 'signature');
3924      $form_container->output_row($lang->user_title_contains, "", $form->generate_text_box('conditions[usertitle]', $input['conditions']['usertitle'], array('id' => 'usertitle'))." {$lang->or} ".$form->generate_check_box('conditions[usertitle_blank]', 1, $lang->is_not_blank, array('id' => 'usertitle_blank', 'checked' => $input['conditions']['usertitle_blank'])), 'usertitle');
3925      $greater_options = array(
3926          "greater_than" => $lang->greater_than,
3927          "is_exactly" => $lang->is_exactly,
3928          "less_than" => $lang->less_than
3929      );

".$form->generate_text_box('conditions[postnum]', $input['conditions']['postnum'], array('id' => 'numposts')), 'numposts');
3931

3933      $form_container->output_row($lang->reg_ip_matches, $lang->wildcard, $form->generate_text_box('conditions[regip]', $input['conditions']['regip'], array('id' => 'regip')), 'regip');
3934      $form_container->output_row($lang->last_known_ip, $lang->wildcard, $form->generate_text_box('conditions[lastip]', $input['conditions']['lastip'], array('id' => 'lastip')), 'lastip');
3935      $form_container->output_row($lang->posted_with_ip, $lang->wildcard, $form->generate_text_box('conditions[postip]', $input['conditions']['postip'], array('id' => 'postip')), 'postip');
3936  
3937      $form_container->end();
3938      
3939      // Custom profile fields go here
3940      $form_container = new FormContainer($lang->custom_profile_fields_match);
3941      
3942      // Fetch custom profile fields

3949          }
3950          else
3951          {
3952              $profile_fields['optional'][] = $profile_field;
3953          }
3954      }
3955      
3956      output_custom_profile_fields($profile_fields['required'], $input['profile_fields'], $form_container, $form, true);
3957      output_custom_profile_fields($profile_fields['optional'], $input['profile_fields'], $form_container, $form, true);
3958      
3959      $form_container->end();
3960      
3961      // Autocompletion for usernames
3962      echo '
3963      <script type="text/javascript" src="../jscripts/autocomplete.js?ver=140"></script>
3964      <script type="text/javascript">
3965      <!--
3966          new autoComplete("username", "../xmlhttp.php?action=get_users", {valueSpan: "username"});
3967      // -->
3968      </script>';
3969  }
